projectGridLines.title: Testing Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Assist in the design and development of test cases and test plans.

Execute manual and automated tests to ensure the quality and functionality of software

applications. Collaborate with developers and other team members to resolve issues and improve product quality.

Help maintain and update test documentation and test scripts.

Perform regression testing to validate software updates and fixes.

Learn and apply various testing methodologies and tools.

Provide regular updates on testing progress and issues encountered.

Skill sets:

Basic Programming Knowledge

Software Testing Fundamentals

Ability to create clear and comprehensive test cases and test plans.

Basic knowledge of test automation tools (e.g. Playwright, Selenium, TestNG).

Familiarity with bug tracking tools (e.g. JIRA).

Ability to clearly document and report defects.

 

Traits expectation:

Strong verbal and written communication skills as well as team work skills.

Willingness to assist others and seek help when needed.

Ability to work well in a team environment and collaborate with developers, other testers and business teams.

Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution:
